base_description: Gray kitchen cabinet with two doors and drawers.
part_description: Two drawers on top, two doors below, handles on each, rectangular shape, medium size, positioned symmetrically.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out smoothly, providing access to the storage space within. The doors swing open to reveal a larger compartment, suitable for storing bigger items. Handles facilitate easy opening and closing of both drawers and doors.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall, serving as a storage unit in kitchens or bathrooms. It interacts with users by providing organized storage space and easy access to stored items, enhancing room functionality.
